trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for arguments for events dealing with a change in input language.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para argumentos para eventos que lidam com uma alteração no idioma de entrada.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the base for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, which in turn provide arguments for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> routed events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe fornece a base para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, que por sua vez, fornecer argumentos para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> roteadas eventos, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing a new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> que representa um novo idioma de entrada atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> que representa o idioma de entrada atual anterior.

trans-unit.source: Initializes base class values for a new instance of a deriving class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa valores de classe base para uma nova instância de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> should call this constructor to ensure that values provided by the abstract base class are initialized properly.
trans-unit.target: Classes que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> deve chamar o construtor para garantir que os valores fornecidos pela classe base abstrata são inicializados adequadamente.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automatically call this base constructor.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores de <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automaticamente chamar este construtor base.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> que representa o novo idioma de entrada atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> objeto que representa o novo idioma de entrada atual.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `newLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade é estabelecido por meio de `newLanguageId` parâmetro fornecido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> que representa o idioma de entrada atual anterior.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> que representa o idioma de entrada atual anterior.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `previousLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade é estabelecido por meio de `previousLanguageId` parâmetro fornecido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.
